 Description: - 
 The Koninklijke Bibliotheek (KB) project dealt with the national library of the Netherlands.     The KB uses a Data warehouse (DWH) which acts an archives databank collects data from public libraries and then subsequently integrates, harmonizes and combines these items of data which is then used for library research and the library monitor, benchmarking and marketing purposes. 
The current DWH is not capable to sustain future growth and the support required for the desired functionalities, which is why the KB decided to go ahead and replace it with DWH 2.0.

Project: Traceability   
 
Project Description: Traceability is the ability of finding out where a product comes from 

and following its route throughout the entire transformation and distribution chain. The 

inviolability of blockchain gives the traceability chain an even more convincing value. Users 

of the chain cannot change it because it is secure and jointly owned by various entities. In 

fact, the information it contains is considered to be reliable and cannot be doubted. It is not 

operated by an actor which could have economic or political interests.  

 

Role               : Full stack developer 
Technology : Hyperledger Fabric, Go, Node JS, Angular 7, Mongo DB 
OS   : Windows 10

✓ Developed services to interact with the Hyperledger fabric ledger 
✓ Developed the user interface of the application using Angular 7 

 
 

Project: Syndicated loans on Blockchain   
 
Project Description: A syndicated loan, also known as a syndicated bank facility, is 

financing offered by a group of lenders – referred to as a syndicate – who work together to 

provide funds for a single borrower. The borrower can be a corporation, a large project or a 

sovereignty, such as a government. Since there is so much of manual process, we made an 

application to reduce the manual effort. 

Benefits: 

• Reduce transaction and record-keeping costs 

• Streamline business operations 

• Faster settlement times 

• Easier audits and compliance 

• Secure, confidential and real time information with no broken or missing pieces with 

an immutable history
